detectors.description:
ERC20.constructor(string,string).name (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#444) shadows:
	- ERC20.name() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#453-455) (function)

ERC20.constructor(string,string).symbol (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#444) shadows:
	- ERC20.symbol() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#461-463) (function)

Address.isContract(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#280-289) uses assembly
	- INLINE ASM (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#287)

Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#373-394) uses assembly
	- INLINE ASM (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#386-389)
Pragma version^0.6.0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#6) allows old versions
solc-0.6.6 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.6.6 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#307-313):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#311)

Low level call in Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#373-394):
	- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#377)

Bitcoin2.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#731-733) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _mint(msg.sender,1000000000000000000000000000000) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin2.sol#732)
